title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - November 16, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - November 16, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark link up to talk about the closing statements and deliberations in the Kyle Rittenhouse case, as well as reports coming from a US Marshall about the verdict that evokes a wild coincidence.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
